title: Tracking advisor and manager changes with alerts
text:
You can set alerts to monitor funds for Advisor Change, Fund Subadvisor Change, and Fund Manager Change. To set these alerts for a list, do the following:

In the header, hover the cursor over the Menu icon, then select Lists & Screens. The Lists & Screens page opens. In the row of the list you want to be subscribed to, hover the cursor over the Actions icon. When the Actions menu opens, select Add/Edit Alerts. The Add Alerts window opens.







When you locate an alert type you want to associate with the list, do the following:

Click its slider, and

Select your preferred delivery method(s) (In product and/or Email).



Scroll down to see more alert types.

Note: Each alert type includes a description. When you have finished selecting alert types and delivery methods, click Save.
